title: Good News! SDUI with Compose course is on its way.
short_desc: In my personal experience, this architecture has proved to be invaluable. In one of my apps, I started with Firebase on the back end which is great for quickly building your app. I knew eventually I’d have to shift to my own server.

title: How to change aspect ratio on Mac screen.
short_desc: There is no stock way to adjust the resolution of a Retina Display Mac. According to Apple: “Retina displays use scaled resolutions rather than the specific resolution settings that external displays use. If you need to use a different resolution than those available on the built-in display, attach an external display via HDMI, Thunderbolt or DisplayPort.
